title: Ep. 17 - Where The Real Cultural Battle Is Being Fought
description:
The ONLY meaningful dividing line in the culture war is this: those who defend morality, virtue, the family, and the sanctity of life on one side, and those who are hostile or indifferent on the other.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
